title: The Cubbies
creator_credit: David Woodgate, Ron Saunders and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Features an adventure playground which allows children to play on their own terms, and enables creative expression. Through the eyes of Joan Healy, Supervisor of the Fitzroy Adventure Playground (South Australia), the film takes a candid look at the children and their projects.
creator_credit_for_label: David Woodgate, Ron Saunders and South Australian Film Corporation
description: Features an adventure playground which allows children to play on their own terms, and enables creative expression. Through the eyes of Joan Healy, Supervisor of the Fitzroy Adventure Playground (South Australia), the film takes a candid look at the children and their projects.
